meanings.definition: Occurring or done before the usual or proper time.
meanings.sent1: The premature baby needed extra care in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The flowers bloomed prematurely due to the warm weather.
meanings.sent3: It was premature to start celebrating before the game was over.
meanings.sent4: Her premature decision to quit her job came back to haunt her.
meanings.sent5: The premature announcement caused confusion among the team.

meanings.definition: Born before the end of the normal period of gestation.
meanings.sent1: The premature kitten was tiny but full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The premature foal needed special attention from the vet.
meanings.sent3: The premature arrival of the pizza made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her premature departure from the party left her friends surprised.
meanings.sent5: The premature chick struggled to keep up with its siblings.
